title: Longhorns Daily News : Four of Texa offensive stars were named 2023 Earl Campbell Tyler Rose Award semifinalists
body_text:
The Texas Longhorns’ football program is the only team to produce multiple semifinalists for this season’s Earl Campbell Tyler Rose Award, which is presented annually to the nation’s top Division 1 offensive player. Texas has four semifinalists altogether in 2023, including quarterback Quinn Ewers, running back Jonathon Brooks, and wide receivers Xavier Worthy and Adonai Mitchell.
Longhorns Daily News: Four of Texas’ offensive stars were named 2023 Earl Campbell Tyler Rose Award semifinalists
